cast.overview: After being brutally murdered, 14-year-old Susie Salmon watches from heaven over her grief-stricken family -- and her killer. As she observes their daily lives, she must balance her thirst for revenge with her desire for her family to heal.
cast.title: The Lovely Bones

details.biography: She is best known for her staring role in Troma Entertainments, award-winning, 'Return to Nuke 'Em High' (a revamped, reboot of the 1984 cult classic, 'The Class of Nuke 'Em High'). Her career also includes roles in Gossip Girl, The Good Wife, MTV Pranks, and working under the mentorship of Academy Award Winning directors Peter Jackson (The Lovely Bones) and Josh Fox (Gasland). She has been featured in various publications including The New York Times, Interview Magazine, TIME Magazine, The Hollywood Reporter and Le Figaro. Much in the vein of her mentors, Catherine is also known for spearheading Troma Entertainments, 'Occupy Cannes' Campaign and its subsequent documentary.
details.name: Catherine Corcoran
